source:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_00<tab>Little Yin awaits word that you are prepared for transfiguration.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

廃屋敷の陰気なゴースト人形は、冒険者の協力を必要としているようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_01<tab>Having consulted her network of manor furnishings, Little Yin reports details regarding the true forms of those malevolent mummers who she believes to possess useful information. You also learn that assorted decorations have taken to using transfiguration magicks bestowed by the pumpkin-headed apparition, so you need only speak with one in order to be transformed into a convincingly freakish fiend.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

陰気なゴースト人形から、怪しい道化師たちの特徴を聞くことができた。怪しい道化師の正体を推測し、廃屋敷108号室の「バット好きのゴースト人形」「アーリマン好きのゴースト人形」「サキュバス好きのゴースト人形」のいずれかに話しかけて、変身状態になろう。なお、廃屋敷へは、グリダニアのミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「仮装パーティーの招待係」に話しかけることで移動できる。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_02<tab>You speak to the appropriate enthusiast in room 108 and are transfigured into a devilish apparition. Your new form should have scare potential significant enough to prod the malevolent mummers into divulging the information you seek.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_02<tab>変身状態になった。廃屋敷1階のどこかにいる、3人の「怪しい道化師」を見つけ出し、「トリック・オア・トリート」を行おう。

※108号室にいる魔物好きのゴースト人形たちに話しかけると、変身状態になることができます。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_03<tab>With your impeccable disguise, you deceive the mummers into revealing the location of a memo that may hold the secret of where T'maritaa─who unfortunately seems to have already joined the several score pumpkins decorating the manor─is being held.
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_03<tab>怪しい道化師たちにトリック・オア・トリートを行った。道化師たちは変身状態の冒険者を仲間だと勘違いして油断したようだ。108号室の「陰気なゴースト人形」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_04<tab>You report your findings to Little Yin and Little Yang. The former reacts with an uncharacteristic show of enthusiasm, while the latter reveals that he was not, in fact, paying attention. For both of their sakes, you agree to calmly review what you have learned so far before proceeding to the next phase of the plan.
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_04<tab>陰気なゴースト人形に報告した。引き続き、ゴースト人形たちと協力してコンチネンタル・サーカスの悪巧みを阻止しよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_05<tab>
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SEQ_05<tab>

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_TODO_00<tab>Speak to an enthusiast to be transfigured into a fiend.
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_TODO_00<tab>魔物好きのゴースト人形と話して変身状態になる

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_TODO_01<tab>Use Tricksome Treat on malevolent mummers.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_TODO_01<tab>変身状態で怪しい道化師たちに
トリック・オア・トリートを行う

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_TODO_02<tab>Report to Little Yin.
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_TODO_02<tab>陰気なゴースト人形に報告する

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_000<tab>That was fast─are you so eager to part with your current visage? I suppose I can see why. In any case, you'll need to turn yourself into one of three types of fiend to adequately blend in with the Continental Circus members I've observed skulking about the manor.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_000<tab>ボクがこれまでに仕入れた情報をもとに、
怪しい道化師たちの正体を、3種類の魔物に絞り込んでいます。
同じ種類の魔物になれば、仲間だと勘違いして油断するはず……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_001<tab>Much to my dismay, it seems that the troupe is already searching for their next victim. <sigh> <var 1A 02 /var>Loudly<var 1A 01 /var> searching.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_001<tab>はぁ……まだ行方不明者は見つかっていませんが、
道化師たちが新たなターゲットを探しているようですね。
これ以上、屋敷が騒々しくなってはたまりません……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_002<tab>Can you get them out of the way for a bit so that I can have some peace? In disguise, naturally, lest they know we're trying to foil their plot. The last thing I need is a bunch of ghouls running to and fro, screeching that the mortals are on to them.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_002<tab>例のごとく、
道化師たちの正体と同じ魔物に変身して、油断させましょう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_003<tab>Huh, you really came back. It's a good thing, too, because those Continental Circus fools don't know when to give up. They're making a cacophony looking for a new victim. Where they get the energy, I don't know.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_003<tab>あ……また会えましたね……。
道化師たちが懲りずに新たなターゲットを探しているようです。
ボクの心の平穏のためにも、協力してもらえませんか……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_004<tab>Thankfully, what they lack in quietude they make up for in stupidity. I'm sure you can derail their efforts by interrupting their trains of thought. Subtly, mind. I don't want to think about the uproar you'll cause if you march straight up to them wearing that face. No offense intended.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_004<tab>例のごとく、
道化師たちの正体と同じ魔物に変身して、油断させましょう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_005<tab>Ahem. According to decorative eyewitnesses, the mummers currently on duty are in truth “diminutive, winged, pointy-eared creatures.”
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_005<tab>他の人形の目撃情報によると、道化師の正体の特徴は、
「羽が生えていて、尖った耳を持つ小型の魔物」
だったということです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_006<tab>Ahem. According to decorative eyewitnesses, the mummers currently on duty are in truth “large, winged, single-eyed creatures.”
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_006<tab>他の人形の目撃情報によると、道化師の正体の特徴は、
「羽が生えていて、大きなひとつ目が特徴の魔物」
だったということです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_007<tab>Ahem. According to decorative eyewitnesses, the mummers currently on duty are in truth “alluring, airborne, long-taloned creatures.”
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_007<tab>他の人形の目撃情報によると、道化師の正体の特徴は、
「浮遊が可能で、鋭い爪を持つ美しい魔物」
だったということです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_008<tab>I assume that gives you a decent idea of what we're dealing with. All three mummers are currently on the ground floor, so you should have little trouble finding them. Now all that's left is to get you transfigured.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_008<tab>……特徴から道化師の正体の見当はつきますか？
目撃されている3人の怪しい道化師は、
すべて同じ種類の魔物で、1階で目撃されているようです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_009<tab>As you can see, some of my fellows are so taken with the idea that they have already donned the appearances of their favorite All Saints' Wake fiends. You need only speak to whichever has given herself the form you seek, and she will weave the magicks for you. <sigh> With boisterous enthusiasm, I'm sure.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_009<tab>さあ……正体がわかったら、
この部屋の「魔物好きのゴースト人形」たちと話してください。
道化師たちの正体と同じ魔物に変身して、油断させましょう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_010<tab>Again, the mummers currently on duty are in truth “diminutive, winged, pointy-eared creatures.” Do try to retain that long enough to cross the room.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_010<tab>怪しい道化師たちの正体は、
「羽が生えていて、尖った耳を持つ小型の魔物」
だったということです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_011<tab>Again, the mummers currently on duty are in truth “large, winged, single-eyed creatures.” Do try to retain that long enough to cross the room.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_011<tab>怪しい道化師たちの正体は、
「羽が生えていて、大きなひとつ目が特徴の魔物」
だったということです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_012<tab>Again, the mummers currently on duty are in truth “alluring, airborne, long-taloned creatures.” Do try to retain that long enough to cross the room.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_012<tab>怪しい道化師たちの正体は、
「浮遊が可能で、鋭い爪を持つ美しい魔物」
だったということです……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_013<tab>Once you are hideously transfigured, you'll find the mummers elsewhere on the ground floor.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_013<tab>……見当はつきましたか？
怪しい道化師たちは、3人とも1階で目撃されています。
「魔物好きのゴースト人形」たちと話すと変身できますよ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_BATGHOST03170_000_020<tab>Aren't bats just the cutest little plague-bearers you ever did see? You want to be an oh-so-cuddly screeching nightmare too, right? I know you do!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_BATGHOST03170_000_020<tab>「バット」に変身したいの？
はいは～い、任せて！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_AHRIMANGHOST03170_000_021<tab>Feast your two tiny peepers on this giant eyeball! Isn't it ghastly? It's just so...big. And round! Don't you want one?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_AHRIMANGHOST03170_000_021<tab>「アーリマン」に変身したいのかい？
そらよっと！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUCCUBUSGHOST03170_000_022<tab>How do I look? Just kidding, I know the answer. Positively irresistible! I've made three people fall down the stairs <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((tonight)) ((this morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((tonight)) /var>)) /var> alone! Want to join me?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUCCUBUSGHOST03170_000_022<tab>「サキュバス」に変身したいのかしら？
私に任せてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>The action <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Tricksome Treat<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will become available on the pet hotbar once transfigured.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>「変身状態」の時に、
EXホットバーから「トリック・オア・トリート」を
利用できるようになりました。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>Cast <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Tricksome Treat<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> on malevolent mummers to startle them.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>怪しい道化師たちを見つけたら、
「トリック・オア・トリート」を使用してみましょう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_030<tab>Ahhh! What the─!?
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_030<tab>わっ！？　なんだなんだ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_030<tab>Oh, it's you. Why, exactly, aren't you guarding the memo? I need to be about finding our next victim, and mark my words─there will be seven hells to pay if I hear that some interloper has walked off with our guest-turned-pumpkin in the meantime.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_030<tab>その姿、仲間か……驚かさないでくれ。
お前、暇なら例のメモに書いてある部屋を見張りに行ってくれよ。
誘拐したヒトをカボチャに変えて、保管してるんだ！　頼んだぞ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_031<tab>Gyaaah! A fiend!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_031<tab>きゃあ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_031<tab>Oh, wait, I'm also a fiend. Phew. Don't startle me like that! You made me forget who I am. And where we put that pumpkin! Drat! Ah, well, that's what the memo is for.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_031<tab>ちょっと、例のカボチャの部屋忘れちゃうでしょう！？
なんてね……忘れないようにメモに書いたんだから。
さて、私は見回りを続けてくるわ。　またね、お仲間さん。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_032<tab>Room 201, room 201, room 201, ro─ Augh!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_032<tab>201号室……201号室……。
う、うわああ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_032<tab>Honestly! Can't you just greet me like a <var 1A 02 /var>normal<var 1A 01 /var> agent of evil? Now I'm going to have to spend my whole patrol trying to remember what room we put the memo in.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_032<tab>なんだよ……仲間じゃないか……！
げ……メモがあるのは何号室だっけ？
次の持ち場に移動しながら思い出そう……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_033<tab>Ahhh! What the─!?
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_033<tab>わっ！？　なんだなんだ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_033<tab>Oh, is it time to change the watch already? Well, I appreciate your promptness, I suppose...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_033<tab>仲間か……って、もう交代の時間？
それじゃ、あとはよろしく頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_034<tab>Gyaaah! A fiend!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_034<tab>きゃあ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_034<tab>O-Oh, right. We're both fiends. And you're ready to switch? That's a relief. My mother told me that if you hold a transformation too long, you get stuck that way...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_034<tab>いいい、いきなりびっくりさせないでよ……！
……あらま、もう交代してくれるの？
やっとスキンチェンジを解いてくつろげるわぁ～。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_035<tab>Augh!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_035<tab>う、うわああ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_035<tab>What is wrong with you? Forget it, just keep watch. I'm going to go and eat my weight in pumpkin pastries.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_035<tab>なんだよ……仲間じゃないか……！
えっ、もう交代してくれるのかい？
パーティーに紛れ込んでお菓子でも食べようかな～。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_036<tab>Ahhh! What the─!?
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_036<tab>わっ！？　なんだなんだ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_036<tab>What are you doing here? This isn't your floor... I'll let it slide this time, but I'm going to have to report you if you continue to make a nuisance of yourself.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_036<tab>なんでここにいるんだ？
お前たちの持ち場はここじゃないだろう？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>Your appearance has aroused suspicion. Return to room 108 and take the form of a different type of fiend.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_000_039<tab>どうやら、魔物の種類が違うようだ……。
108号室に戻り、別の魔物に変身してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_037<tab>Gyaaah! A fiend!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_037<tab>きゃあ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_037<tab>I-I mean, a different kind of fiend! I don't think you're supposed to be on this floor...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_037<tab>いいい、いきなりびっくりさせないでよ……！
それにあなたたちの持ち場はここじゃないはずよ？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_100_039<tab>Your appearance has aroused suspicion. Return to room 108 and take the form of a different type of fiend.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_100_039<tab>どうやら、魔物の種類が違うようだ……。
108号室に戻り、別の魔物に変身してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_038<tab>Augh!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_038<tab>う、うわああ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_038<tab>You're not supposed to be here! We're on guard duty tonight! Honestly, you're useless, the lot of you...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_038<tab>驚かさないでくれよ……！
……君たちの持ち場はここじゃないよ。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_110_039<tab>Your appearance has aroused suspicion. Return to room 108 and take the form of a different type of fiend.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_110_039<tab>どうやら、魔物の種類が違うようだ……。
108号室に戻り、別の魔物に変身してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_040<tab>Ahhh! What the─!?
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_000_040<tab>わっ！？　なんだなんだ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_040<tab>Oh, my apologies─that guise is unfamiliar to me. Are you a new recruit? In any case, that's the kind of enthusiasm for subterfuge that I like to see. I leave this post in your capable hands.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_040<tab>見かけない変身、もしかして新入りか……？
それじゃ遠慮なく交代してもらおう、あとは頼んだよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_041<tab>Gyaaah!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_000_041<tab>きゃあ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_041<tab>Y-You're truly a fiend, you say? What a remarkable disguise! V-Very effective. In fact, I think I'll have a seat for a moment. Calm my nerves and such. Please watch my post for me!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_100_041<tab>いいい、いきなりびっくりさせないでよ……！
あら……あなた新入りさん？　交代してくれるの？
やっとスキンチェンジを解いてくつろげるわぁ～。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_042<tab>Augh!
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_000_042<tab>う、うわああ！？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_042<tab>Nice transformation, but was that really necessary? You must be new around here. Hmm... And if you're new, you probably don't know that if you scare another member of the troupe, you have to stand guard while they go and enjoy the buffet. Sorry, I don't make the rules!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_100_042<tab>……って、それはスキンチェンジ？
もしかしてコンチネンタル・サーカスの新入りかい？
ラッキー、続きの仕事は任せたよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_042<tab>I'll thank you not to interrupt me unless it's truly urgent. I have important kidnapping to do.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNA03170_100_042<tab>なんだよ、今話しかけないでくれ。
俺好みのカワイ子ちゃんを探してるんだから。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_110_042<tab>The malevolent mummer seems too focused on the task at hand to let anything slip. Casting Tricksome Treat while transfigured should break his concentration.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_110_042<tab>怪しい道化師は、何かに気を取られているようだ。
108号室で「変身状態」となり、EXホットバーから、
「トリック・オア・トリート」を使用してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_120_042<tab>No, mother... I shan't...fall...sleep... Mmm...mildew...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNB03170_120_042<tab>ふあぁ……このカビの匂い、薄暗さ……。
仕事中だというのに、心地良くて眠くなってきちゃうわ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_130_042<tab>The malevolent mummer seems to be dozing off and incapable of coherent communication. Casting Tricksome Treat while transfigured should snap her out of it.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_130_042<tab>怪しい道化師は、眠そうにしている。
108号室で「変身状態」となり、EXホットバーから、
「トリック・オア・トリート」を使用してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_140_042<tab>Are those burning pumpkin cookies I smell? I wonder if I could sneak away, just for dessert...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUSPICIOUSCLOWNC03170_140_042<tab>腹減ったなぁ……。
どこからか甘い匂いがするぜ……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_150_042<tab>The malevolent mummer seems too focused on fantasizing about food to let anything useful slip. Casting Tricksome Treat while transfigured should snap him out of his reverie.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SYSTEM_150_042<tab>怪しい道化師は、何かに気を取られているようだ。
108号室で「変身状態」となり、EXホットバーから、
「トリック・オア・トリート」を使用してみよう。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_BATGHOST03170_000_043<tab>Aren't bats just the cutest little plague-bearers you ever did see? You want to be an oh-so-cuddly screeching nightmare too, right? I know you do!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_BATGHOST03170_000_043<tab>「バット」に変身したいの？
はいは～い、任せて！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_AHRIMANGHOST03170_000_044<tab>Feast your two tiny peepers on this giant eyeball! Isn't it ghastly? It's just so...big. And round! Don't you want one?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_AHRIMANGHOST03170_000_044<tab>「アーリマン」に変身したいのかい？
そらよっと！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUCCUBUSGHOST03170_000_045<tab>How do I look? Just kidding, I know the answer. Positively irresistible! I've made three people fall down the stairs <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((tonight)) ((this morning)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((today)) ((tonight)) /var>)) /var> alone! Want to join me?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUCCUBUSGHOST03170_000_045<tab>「サキュバス」に変身したいのかしら？
私に任せてちょうだい！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_BATGHOST03170_000_046<tab>Oh, I see you're enjoying your new form! If the spell wears off and you need to get cute as a button in a hurry, you know where to find me!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_BATGHOST03170_000_046<tab>おや、君はもう変身しているよ！
変身が解けたらまたおいで！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_AHRIMANGHOST03170_000_047<tab>I spy with my massive, pulsating eye a fellow guiser! If you're ever in need of my assistance, resume your usual form. I will transfigure you into a most sightly ahriman.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_AHRIMANGHOST03170_000_047<tab>すでに変身状態のようだね！
変身が解けたらまたおいでよ！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUCCUBUSGHOST03170_000_048<tab>Yes, your transfiguration is quite the work of art. You are not as lovely as I, but I'm sure you can cause quite a few injuries regardless. Do come back if you need me to weave my magicks!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_SUCCUBUSGHOST03170_000_048<tab>あら、すでに変身しているわよ？
変身が解けたら、またいらっしゃいね！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_049<tab>If you're done, let me remove that transfiguration for you. You wouldn't want your face to get stuck like that. Or would you?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_049<tab>……おかえりなさい。
ひとまず変身を解きますね……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_050<tab>And what did you learn?
target: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_050<tab>……さて、状況はいかがですか？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_051<tab>Aha! I knew my plan would work! We've got you now, you rowdy little─
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_051<tab>や、やった……！！
うまくいったようですね！！！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_052<tab>Ahem. Let's review the information you collected.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_052<tab>………………コホン。
それにしても、道化師たちが言っていたことが気になりますね。
少し情報を整理してみることにしましょう……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_CHEERFULGHOST03169_100_052<tab>Yes! Wait, what information? Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! When did you get back?
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_CHEERFULGHOST03169_100_052<tab>ふむふむ……ジョーホーの整理だね！
えっと……なんだっけ？

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_100_053<tab>Ah, you're back. Why don't you fill me in while I remove these magicks...
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_100_053<tab>……おかえりなさい。
変身を解きながら状況を伺いましょう……。

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_053<tab>Ahaha! Take that, you raucous goons! That's what you get for interrupting my nap!
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_053<tab>や、やったあ！！
またうまくいったんですね！！！

source: TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_054<tab>Ahem. I appreciate your cooperation, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_FESHLW502_03170_GLOOMYGHOST03169_000_054<tab>………………コホン。
ボクとしたことが、ついはしゃいでしまいました……。
またご協力をお願いしますね……はぁ……。
